Name: market for bamboo pole | bamboo pole | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/16:Manufacture of wood and of products of wood and cork, except furniture; manufacture of articles of straw and plaiting materials/162:Manufacture of products of wood, cork, straw and plaiting materials
Description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/24906/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This dataset represents the global market for bamboo poles. Transport according to the ecoinvent Default Transport Assumptions for global transport, accessible at https://www.ecoinvent.org/files/transport_default_20191112.xlsx, based on transport statistics, according to a methodology developed by Borken & Weidema (2013). ;Bamboo poles are used for the construction of columns, beams, or struts and the production of other bamboo-based construction materials.

This dataset starts with bamboo pole leaving the gate of the producing entity, ready for distribution to consuming entities.

The activity ends with the bamboo pole being delivered to the consuming entity.
